item.title: Veteran CPI Leader Suravaram Sudhakar Reddy Passes Away; Tributes Pour In Across Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: The Indian Communist movement lost one of its great leaders with the passing away of Comrade Suravaram Sudhakar Reddy, former General Secretary of the Communist Party of India (CPI). He breathed his last on 22 August 2025 while undergoing treatment at a private hospital in Hyderabad. He was 83.
The news of his demise has cast a pall of gloom across the Left movement in India. Leaders, cadres, and citizens remembered him as a tireless fighter for workers, peasants, students, and marginal...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Collector Orders Early Detection of High-Risk Pregnancies in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: District Collector B. M. Santosh has directed medical staff to identify high-risk pregnancy cases at an early stage and take all necessary precautions to ensure the safety of both mothers and newborns.
On Saturday, the Collector made a surprise inspection of the Urban Primary Health Centre at Ontalpeta in the district headquarters. During his visit, he reviewed key aspects including doctorsâ€™ attendance, outpatient registrations, staff presence, delivery statistics, vaccination coverage,...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
